attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you agree that Government policy on pensions, means testing, council tax, concessionary travel, post offices and social and long term care fails to meet the needs of older people and unless attended to now, the young of today who will be the pensioners of tomorrow will suffer the same as their parents are today,urgent attention is required now.

rejection.details: The title should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
